name: Hell No ! Zone
description:
Hell No ! Zone  is a simple, 3D FPS, project for the Game Design & Development  specialization. 

Changes Overview - Level Design, Menu Aesthetics and Assets. 

Specific

Level 1 -  Get ammo and the Keycards.  Shoot some insects. 

Level 2 - Kill the Hive Queen 

You will find more details within the game, in the About section.
Do feel free to leave a comment or recommendation.
